entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • how to build mono on macCatalyst os #71614
  • [API Proposal]: Add ECDiffieHellman.DeriveSecretAgreement method #71613
  • PGO: Various System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.* tests fail with NullReferenceException #71611
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Compile Error on M1 Mac - Missing OSX-ARM64 Runtime Package #71622
  • .NET Core 3.1 RSA decryption with 3k certificates failed on Linux environments due to OAEP padding #71607
  • Too high memory usage triggers oom-reaper #71606
  • Test failure System.SpanTests.ReadOnlySpanTests.TestMatchLastIndexOfAny_TwoByte #71604
  • Bad X509Certificate2..ctor in .NET 6 on Android #71603

Closed

  • ObservableCollection Bug #69008
  • [Android] Stack overflow crash when using dotnet-trace for profiled aot #71143
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 [System.Text.Json] Recursive property in collection type results in JsonException #71608
  • [API Proposal]: attribute for polymorphic json serialisation (not deserialisation) #71605
  • GVM lookup failure in System.Collections.Immutable test #70878
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • CI test: run libs tests multiple times #71621
  • Improve Generics support in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #71619
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Handle out-of-bounds access to locals in block morphing #71617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Conditional nodes and Arm64 code generation #71616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reordering operands in fgMorphModToSubMulDiv #71615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure JsonPropertyInfo<T> matches property type and not the converter type #71612
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add support for int keyed dictionaries to configuration binder #71609
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WBT: Enable playwright based tests #71602
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • [mono][eventpipe] Write primitive types and UTF-16 strings in little endian order #68648
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix EventPipe profiler recursion in class_loading under full AOT (#71143) #71610
    area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Refactor JsonPropertyInfo initialization infrastructure and implement JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider #71514
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Implement type loader support for thread statics #71524
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Get S.C.Immutable.Tests running with NativeAOT #71527
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-create profile data on profile-use-only mode #71420
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix long latencies in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` lock operations due to `Sleep(1)` #70165
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Linker to NativeAOT sync #71485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Enable onCallFrame evaluation of static fields in classes/interfaces from a static method. #70560
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Unix arm64 atomics #71512
    arch-arm64, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix all remaining C4018 warnings and enable the check during build #71269
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on ARM #71598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Use ObjectDisposedException.ThrowIf in more places #71546
    area-Meta
  • Ask SChannel for stapled OCSP when the client will do revocation #71570
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net tests #71385
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Delete `lvVerTypeInfo` #71597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Removing UnmanagedCallersOnly_MonoAot tests #71535
    area-Interop-mono
  • Throw protocol error returned by GoAway on HTTP/2 connection negotation #71572
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix debugging when it's using a external library without debug information #71560
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [QUIC] API QuicListener #71579
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Return receive flags from ReceiveMessageFromAsync on Windows #71462
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix for issue#58421 #62624
    area-Serialization
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the assert error within the "CodeGen::genCodeForNullCheck()" #71577
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to find a match: dotnet-sdk-6.0 for RHEL #26431
  • I couldn't figure out the best area label to add to this PR. If you have write-permissions please help me learn by adding exactly one area label. #26429

PullRequests

Created

  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26420
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the RIDs target to the latest one #26096
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979
  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Delete unnecessary test project files #22233
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • There is no way to get "Snippets behavior"/"Enter key behavior" to the default after change #62363
  • Two UI checkboxes are tied to a single option #62362

PullRequests

Updated

  • Verify diagnostics in parsing tests #62341
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio 2022 Couldn't start the SPA development server with command 'npm start' #42568
  • Additional Extensibility of `CreateHandler()` on `TestServer` #42567
  • NuGet: Authentication packages versioning #42566
  • [Blazor] Avoid completely replacing the DOM when components are re-rendered after prerendering #42561
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Swagger does NOT work with non-'/' path base #42559
  • Typo in ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #42558

Closed

  • Blazor cant find layout after moving RootDirectory #42560
  • The code is not compiled #42426
  • SignalR JavaScript client: Updating query parameters during active connection #41405
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed typo for ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #42562
    community-contribution
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `89af41a` to `34c6f4e` #42564
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5376968` to `4219e72` #42565
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1860204 #42551
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor][Prototype] Support state in NavigationManager #42534
    area-blazor
  • `CreatedResult` should accept null location #42502
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TalkBack doesn't navigate to headings contained in StackLayout with a SemanticProperties.Description #8524
  • AbsoluteLayout wrong size #8519
  • Hostname not verified when sending request on Android #8518
  • OnAppearing not triggered when going back from Modal page #8513
  • PathGeometry results in HRESULT E_FAIL - Invalid number #8512
    6.0.300
  • Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Platform error #8509

Closed

  • MAUI Blazor problems return #8511
  • Very stange problem: XAML refuses to update #8415
  • Unable to set BoxViews BackgroundColor in XAML #8503
    6.0.300
  • BlazorWebView - grey screen on one machine #8461
  • Issue Android version 12 API 31 #7404
    6.0-sr3

PullRequests

Created

  • Call UpdateEmptyView when switching adapters #8522
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr3
  • Changed default Border StrokeShape value #8521
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Update Border StrokeTickness even if StrokeShape is null #8520
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/ui-tools
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 4.1.1 to 4.3.0 #8517
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.Support from 4.1.1 to 4.3.0 #8516
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.1 to 1.1.2 #8515
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Ensure the iOS ScrollView content container is at least the ScrollView size #8451
    area/layout 🔲
  • Use the WASDK self-contained by default #8432
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, 6.0-sr3
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #8475
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    do-not-merge
  • Fix DatePicker on iOS so that it can GC #8476
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen #8298
    area/single project ☝️, platform/tizen, .NET 7
